title.name: General Settings
title.description: The general settings of this app

autostart.name: Autostart on Boot
autostart.description: Set whether the app starts automatically on system boot

check_update.name: Check for Updates
check_update.description: Set whether to check for updates at startup

show_startup_window.name: Show Startup Window
show_startup_window.description: Set whether to show the startup window at launch

export_diagnostic_data.name: Export Diagnostic Data
export_diagnostic_data.description: Set whether to export diagnostic data on exit

export_settings.name: Export Settings
export_settings.description: Set whether to export settings on exit

import_settings.name: Import Settings
import_settings.description: Set whether to import settings on startup

export_all_data.name: Export All Data
export_all_data.description: Set whether to export all data on exit

import_all_data.name: Import All Data
import_all_data.description: Set whether to import all data on startup

dpiScale.name: DPI Scale
dpiScale.description: Set the app DPI scaling (requires restart)

title.name: Roll Call Table
title.description: Table for displaying and managing roll call lists

name: Present
Student ID
Name
Gender
Group
HeaderLabels.description: Column headers for the roll call table

set_pool_name.name: Set Prize Pool Name
set_pool_name.description: Set the name of the prize pool

title.name: Lottery Table
title.description: Table for displaying and managing lottery lists

name: Exists
Index
Prize
Weight
HeaderLabels.description: Column headers for the lottery table

extraction_function.name: Extraction Functions
extraction_function.description: Settings related to roll call extraction features

display_settings.name: Display Settings
display_settings.description: Settings for how roll call results are displayed

basic_animation_settings.name: Animation Settings
basic_animation_settings.description: Settings related to roll call animation effects

color_theme_settings.name: Color Theme Settings
color_theme_settings.description: Color theme settings for roll call results display

student_image_settings.name: Student Avatar Settings
student_image_settings.description: Settings for student avatars in roll call results display

music_settings.name: Music Settings
music_settings.description: Settings related to roll call music

draw_mode.name: Draw Mode
draw_mode.description: Set the draw mode for roll call

clear_record.name: Clear Record Mode
clear_record.description: Set how roll call extraction records are cleared

half_repeat.name: Partial Repeat Count
half_repeat.description: Set the number of partial repeats

clear_time.name: Timed Clear After Extraction
clear_time.description: Set the time (seconds) after which extraction records are cleared

draw_type.name: Draw Type
draw_type.description: Set the draw type for roll call

font_size.name: Font Size
font_size.description: Set the font size for roll call results display

display_format.name: Result Display Format
display_format.description: Set the format for displaying roll call results

show_random.name: Show Random Group Member Format
show_random.description: Set how random group members are shown

animation.name: Animation Mode
animation.description: Set the animation effect for roll call draws

animation_interval.name: Animation Interval
animation_interval.description: Set the interval for roll call animation (ms)

autoplay_count.name: Autoplay Count
autoplay_count.description: Set how many times the roll call animation auto-plays

animation_color_theme.name: Animation Color Theme
animation_color_theme.description: Set the color theme for roll call animation

result_color_theme.name: Result Color Theme
result_color_theme.description: Set the color theme for roll call result display

animation_fixed_color.name: Animation Fixed Color
animation_fixed_color.description: Set the fixed color used during roll call animations

result_fixed_color.name: Result Fixed Color
result_fixed_color.description: Set the fixed color used for roll call results display

student_image.name: Show Student Images
student_image.description: Set whether to show student images

open_student_image_folder.name: Student Image Folder
open_student_image_folder.description: Manage student image files; image filenames must match student names

animation_music.description: Set whether to play animation music

result_music.name: Result Music
result_music.description: Set whether to play result music

open_animation_music_folder.description: Manage animation music files and enable random playback

open_result_music_folder.description: Manage result music files and enable random playback
